Offering_dept: Bachelor Program of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science
Course_description: 經由修此門課,同學們能熟悉數位邏輯設計理論與實務,包含組合與序向邏輯設計及邏輯架構設計.
Course_objectives:
1. 對邏輯設計有基礎之瞭解
2. 瞭解數位邏輯電路設計原理及應用
3. 學習由理論到邏輯電路的轉換
Course_content:
課程大綱: Digital Logic Design
Binary Systems
Boolean Algebra and Logic Gates
Gate-level Minimization
Combinational Logic
Synchronous Sequential Logic
Memory and Programmable Logic
Registers and Counters
Advanced Topics
Evaluation:
1. 第1次期中考試(30％)
2. 第2次期中考試(30％)
3. 期末考試(30％)
4. 作業(10％)
Textbook: M. Morris Mano and Michael D. Ciletti, “ Digital Design ”, Prentice Hall, 6 Edition.
